description: Adds a rider to the entity. Requires minecraft:rideable.
title: Add Rider

riders.title: Riders
riders.description: List of riders to be added to the entity. Can only spawn as many riders as "minecraft:rideable" has "seat_count".

entity_type.title: Entity Type
entity_type.description: The entity type that will be riding this entity.

spawn_event.title: Event: On Spawn
spawn_event.description: The spawn event that will be used when the riding entity is created.
